# Gobbling

## Pronunciation



## Meanings

### Verb

To eat hastily or greedily; to scoff or scarf (often used with up)

> He gobbled four hot dogs in three minutes.

### Verb

To make the sound of a turkey.

### Noun

The act of eating greedily and noisily.

---

The sound of a turkey.




gobbling
